message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 9-4-1, translated into en
data:
Data availability:

Data are available for more than 140 countries.

Time series:

Data for this indicator are available as of 2000 in the UN Global SDG Database, but longer time series are available in the IEA database (IEA CO2 emissions from fuel combustion) and the UNIDO MVA database.

Disaggregation:

Data can be presented for national totals, for the manufacturing sector, and by industrial subsector.
